data.introduce: 国内公布运价查询服务可以查询指定航线与日期上特定航空公司所发布的运价信息，对应于eTerm中的FD指令。
data.business: 对应于eTerm中的FD指令，用来查询国内航空公司对国内航段发布的运价信息。
data.functions: 查询指定航线与日期上特定国内航空公司所发布的运价信息；
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirFareDisplayRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内公布运价查询请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"零售商信息","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码）：如：PEK099","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"OriginDestinationInformation","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发到达地信息","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOptions","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OD项集合","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOption","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OD项","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发地三字码","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地三字码：如：SHA","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地三字码","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"机型信息","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机型","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码：如:CA","children":[]}]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期：格式:YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerInfoSummary","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅行信息","children":[{"name":"AirTravelerAvail","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客类型、数量信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客类型","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirFareDisplayRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内公布运价查询响应","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirItineraryPricingInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"ItinTotalFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"总价信息","children":[{"name":"Taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税费信息","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税费信息","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"金额","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PricingInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"国内公布运价查询中的价格信息","children":[{"name":"@SinglePrice","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"单程价格","children":[]},{"name":"@RoundPrice","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"往返加价","children":[]},{"name":"@DiscountRate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"折扣率","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FareInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"价格和规则信息","children":[{"name":"FareInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"价格信息","children":[{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码：如:CA","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareBasisCodes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础信息集合","children":[{"name":"FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础信息代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"Rule","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价规则信息","children":[{"name":"@RuleID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则ID","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Cabin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位等级","children":[]},{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@ScheduleValidStartDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价有效起始日期：格式：yyyy-MM-dd","children":[]},{"name":"@ScheduleValidEndDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价结束有效日期：格式：yyyy-MM-dd","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":-1,"name":"","msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":-10000,"name":"","msg":"","msgZh":" RESPONSE_EMPTY "},{"code":-301,"name":"","msg":" OFFICE_NOT_PERMITTED ","msgZh":" office认证失败 "},{"code":-303,"name":"","msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":-304,"name":"","msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":-305,"name":"","msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":-306,"name":"","msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":-311,"name":"","msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":-390,"name":"","msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":-402,"name":"","msg":" Input Error ","msgZh":" 输入参数有误 "},{"code":-500,"name":"","msg":" OFFICE_CODE_EMPTY ","msgZh":" office代码为空 "},{"code":-9999,"name":"","msg":" unknown error!  ","msgZh":" 未知错误 "},{"code":403,"name":"","msg":"","msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "}]

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 查询指定日期、航线和航空公司的公布运价信息
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirFareDisplayRQ>
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="PEK099"/>
	</POS>
	<OriginDestinationInformation>
		<OriginDestinationOptions>
			<OriginDestinationOption>
				<FlightSegment DepartureDateTime="2013-12-25T09:30:00">
					<Equipment AirEquipType="738"/>
					<DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK"/>
					<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA"/>
					<MarketingAirline Code="CA"/>
				</FlightSegment>
			</OriginDestinationOption>
		</OriginDestinationOptions>
	</OriginDestinationInformation>
	<TravelerInfoSummary>
		<AirTravelerAvail>
			<PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT"/>
		</AirTravelerAvail>
	</TravelerInfoSummary>
</OTA_AirFareDisplayRQ>
